mapper.select: SELECT p.projectNo, categoryName, projectName, projectStatusMemo, projectImageUrl, projectGoalAmount, TO_CHAR(projectStartDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') projectStartDate, TO_CHAR(projectEndDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') projectEndDate, projectSummary, projectStory, statusNo, p.brandNo, brandName, managerName, managerEmail, managerPhone FROM project p JOIN brand b ON p.brandNo = b.brandNo JOIN project_category pc ON p.categoryNo = pc.categoryNo WHERE p.projectNo = #{projectNo}

SELECT rewardNo, r.projectNo, amount, rewardTitle, rewardContent, rewardOption, shipAmount, TO_CHAR(startShippingDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startShippingDate, limitQuantity FROM reward r JOIN project p ON r.projectNo = p.projectNo WHERE r.projectNo = #{projectNo} ORDER BY amount
